home.about_section_title: Samsar Platform - The Leading Destination for Real Estate and Vehicles in Syria
home.about_section_text_1: Samsar Platform was established to provide a unique experience for customers looking for the best real estate and vehicle offers in Syria. We take pride in offering an integrated service that includes everything you need to find the perfect property or car that suits your needs and budget.
home.about_section_text_2: Thanks to our team of experts and specialists, we ensure you get accurate and reliable information about each listing, with high-quality images and a comprehensive detailed description. We always strive to provide the latest and best offers in the Syrian market.

features.thousands_listings: Thousands of featured listings of properties and vehicles
features.competitive_prices: Competitive prices to suit all budgets
features.user_friendly: User-friendly interface with advanced search options

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.how_to_list: How can I add a listing on Samsar?
faq.how_to_list_answer: Click on 'Add Listing' at the top, fill in the required details, add photos, then publish your listing. We will review and confirm it within 24 hours.
faq.payment_methods_answer: We accept payment via bank cards, e-wallets, and bank transfers. All transactions are 100% secure.
faq.verification_answer: Each listing is reviewed by our team to ensure information accuracy and verify the advertiser's identity.
faq.contact_support: How can I contact customer service?
faq.contact_support_answer: You can reach us via live chat, email, or call us at 123456789. We are available 24/7.

help.title: Need help?
help.description: Our support team is available 24/7 to answer your inquiries.

vehicle_section.subtitle: Discover a wide range of used and new cars at the best prices in Syria

photo_tips.title: Photo Tips for Better Results
photo_tips.tip1: Upload high-quality photos that clearly show your vehicle from multiple angles, including interior and exterior shots.
photo_tips.tip2: We recommend uploading at least 6 photos for better visibility. Include images of the engine, dashboard, and any special features.

errors.mileageInvalid: Mileage must be a positive number
errors.invalidVin: Invalid VIN format. Must be 17 alphanumeric characters.
errors.pricePositive: Price must be a positive number

tooltips.exteriorColor: The color of the vehicle's exterior paint or finish.
tooltips.interiorColor: The color of the vehicle's interior upholstery and trim.
tooltips.condition: The overall state of the vehicle, indicating how well it has been maintained and its current working condition.
tooltips.transmissionType: The type of transmission system in the vehicle. Common types include Automatic, Manual, and CVT (Continuously Variable Transmission).
tooltips.mileage: The total distance the vehicle has traveled, typically measured in kilometers or miles.
tooltips.fuelType: The type of fuel the vehicle uses. Common types include Petrol, Diesel, Electric, and Hybrid.
tooltips.previousOwners: The number of previous owners the vehicle has had. A lower number generally indicates better maintenance history.
tooltips.bodyType: The overall design and shape of the vehicle's body.
tooltips.driveType: The drive type indicates which wheels receive power from the engine. FWD (Front-Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear-Wheel Drive), AWD (All-Wheel Drive), and 4WD (Four-Wheel Drive) are common configurations.
tooltips.engineNumber: The engine number is a unique identifier assigned by the manufacturer to each engine. It's typically found on the engine block or in the vehicle's documentation.
tooltips.serviceHistory: The maintenance and repair history of the vehicle, including any services, repairs, or replacements made.
tooltips.accidentFree: Whether the vehicle has been involved in any accidents or has any damage.
tooltips.importStatus: The import status of the vehicle, indicating if it was originally manufactured for the local market or imported.
tooltips.registrationStatus: The current status of the vehicle's registration with the local transportation authority.
tooltips.warranty: Information about any remaining manufacturer or extended warranty coverage on the vehicle.
tooltips.engineSize: The engine displacement or size, typically measured in cubic centimeters (cc) or liters (L). For example, 1.6L or 2000cc.
tooltips.horsepower: The power output of the vehicle's engine, typically measured in horsepower (hp). Higher values indicate more powerful engines.
tooltips.torque: The rotational force of the vehicle's engine, typically measured in newton-meters (Nm). Higher torque values provide better acceleration and pulling power.
tooltips.roofType: The type of roof the vehicle has, such as fixed, sunroof, moonroof, or convertible.
tooltips.customsCleared: Whether the vehicle has been cleared through customs, indicating that it has been imported and is compliant with local regulations.
tooltips.warrantyPeriod: The length of time the vehicle's warranty is valid, typically measured in months or years.
tooltips.serviceHistoryDetails: Additional details about the vehicle's service history, including any maintenance or repairs made.
tooltips.additionalNotes: Any additional information about the vehicle that may be relevant to potential buyers.

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.show_phone: Show phone number to other users

profile.tip_unique: Use a unique password that you don't use for other accounts
profile.tip_manager: Consider using a password manager to generate and store strong passwords
profile.password_description: Update your password to keep your account secure. Make sure to use a strong password that includes uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.
profile.password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters long
profile.password_needs_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
profile.password_needs_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
profile.password_needs_number: Password must contain at least one number
profile.password_needs_special: Password must contain at least one special character
profile.same_password: New password cannot be the same as current password
profile.password_not_strong: Password does not meet strength requirements
profile.verification_code_sent: Verification code has been sent to your email
profile.verification_code_error: Failed to send verification code. Please try again.
profile.update_error: An error occurred. Please try again.
profile.verification_code_help: We've sent a verification code to your email. Please enter it above.
